amendment.description: Amendment emphasizes expanded funding for support of response, rescue and recovery in the Disaster Relief Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect a $100,000,000 with respect to the Disaster Relief fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Richardson amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Ms. Richardson.
